formattedAddress: 505 Park Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 505 Park Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: SPA Dental Group has the most welcoming, kind, and talented group of employees!! I stumbled across SPA Dental shortly after moving to NYC, and I fell in love after my first appointment. The ambience and vibes at the reception and throughout the entire office is one of cleanliness, warmness, and beauty! However, Dr. Camilo is the main reason I keep coming back. She is a true gem. I explained to her how I wanted to perfect my smile before my wedding, and she came up with the perfect plan for me to achieve that. She helped me with teeth whitening and dental bonding to give me a smile I loved. She always went above and beyond following up with me after every appointment, asking how I was doing and if I wanted to change anything about my results. She not only is so warm and friendly, but she is incredibly talented and good at what she does! Cannot recommend her and SPA Dental enough. I wish I could give more than 5 stars!!!

originalText.text: Great experience at Spa Dental Group. The people are super friendly, the office is nice, and Dr Camilo did a fantastic job with my cleaning and check up. She provided some great recommendations as well for keeping my teeth in good shape. I’ll be a return visitor for sure!

text.text: Great experience at Spa Dental Group. The people are super friendly, the office is nice, and Dr Camilo did a fantastic job with my cleaning and check up. She provided some great recommendations as well for keeping my teeth in good shape. I’ll be a return visitor for sure!

originalText.text:
SPA was not only the cleanest dentist office I’ve been to in the City, but it was filled with some of the nicest people around. Dr. Camilo was excellent across the board - making sure I felt comfortable and providing insights that none of my prior dentists ever mentioned regarding oral hygiene.

Overall 10/10, would recommend.

text.text:

Overall 10/10, would recommend.

originalText.text: Dr. Camilo is AMAZING. Not only is her attitude so sweet and kind and chill but her skills are unmatched. The whitening she did for me is spectacular, people compliment my smile all the time because of the work shes done. Shes super gentle and I love going to the dentist because of her. Love this place never trusting anyone else with my teeth!! 11/10 recommend

text.text: Dr. Camilo is AMAZING. Not only is her attitude so sweet and kind and chill but her skills are unmatched. The whitening she did for me is spectacular, people compliment my smile all the time because of the work shes done. Shes super gentle and I love going to the dentist because of her. Love this place never trusting anyone else with my teeth!! 11/10 recommend

originalText.text: I was on the hunt for a new dentist when I came across Spa Dentist on Zocdoc. I was pleasantly surprised from the moment I walked in, the lobby area is so inviting along with the staff. I was greeted warmly which was much appreciated since I switched dentist due to lack of hospitality from the staff. Dr. Camilo was so kind and did a great job explaining my treatment plan and options. Looking forward to my future visits!
